entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
